# opencga Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    opencga = {
      source = "complexbear/opencga"
    }
  }
}

provider "opencga" {
  username = "user"
  password = "password"
  base_url = "https://localhost"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `base_url` (String)
- `username` (String)

### Optional

- `password` (String, Sensitive)
